cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eiwa

sentence.kanji: 英和辞書をよく使います。
sentence.romaji: eiwa jisho wo yoku tsukaimasu
sentence.english: I often use an English-Japanese dictionary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waei

sentence.kanji: 私は和英辞書をよく使います。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha waei jisho wo yoku tsukaimasu
sentence.english: I often use a Japanese-English dictionary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sankou

sentence.kanji: この本を参考にして下さい。
sentence.romaji: kono hon wo sankou ni shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please refer to this book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sangiin

sentence.kanji: 彼は参議院議員です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sangiin giin desu
sentence.english: He is a member of the House of Councilors.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omairi

sentence.kanji: 家族でお寺にお参りに行きました。
sentence.romaji: kazoku de otera ni omairi ni ikimashita
sentence.english: We payed a visit to the temple with the family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sankousho

sentence.kanji: この参考書はとても役に立つよ。
sentence.romaji: kono sankousho ha totemo yaku ni tatsu yo
sentence.english: This reference book is very useful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mairu

sentence.kanji: さあ、参りましょうか。
sentence.romaji: saa mairimashou ka
sentence.english: Well, shall we go?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mijime

sentence.kanji: 彼は惨めな気持ちになったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mijime na kimochi ni nata no
sentence.english: He began to feel miserable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiritsu

sentence.kanji: IT業界は女性の比率が低い。
sentence.romaji: aitei-gyoukai ha josei no hiritsu ga hikui
sentence.english: The ratio of women in the IT industry is low.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's henkan

sentence.kanji: ひらがなをカタカナに変換しました。
sentence.romaji: hiragana wo katakana ni henkan shimashita
sentence.english: I converted hiragana into katakana.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kage

sentence.kanji: 窓に男性の影が映っています。
sentence.romaji: mado ni dansei no kage ga utsute imasu
sentence.english: There's a man's shadow reflected in the window.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ato

sentence.kanji: ここにタイヤの跡があるわ。
sentence.romaji: koko ni taiya no ato ga aru wa
sentence.english: There is a tire imprint here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ashiato

sentence.kanji: 雪の上にうさぎの足跡があった。
sentence.romaji: yuki no ue ni usagi no ashiato ga ata
sentence.english: There were rabbits' footprints in the snow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuiseki

sentence.kanji: パトカーが車を追跡しているわ。
sentence.romaji: patoka- ga kuruma wo tsuiseki shite iru wa
sentence.english: The police vehicle is chasing a car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiseki

sentence.kanji: 彼のマジックはまるで奇跡です。
sentence.romaji: kare no majiku ha marude kiseki desu
sentence.english: His magic is like a miracle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oudan

sentence.kanji: 道路を横断するときは注意して。
sentence.romaji: douro wo oudan suru toki ha chuui shite
sentence.english: Be careful when crossing the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusuriyubi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は薬指に指輪をはめています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kusuriyubi ni yubiwa wo hamete imasu
sentence.english: She wears a ring on her ring finger.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juutai

sentence.kanji: この国道はよく渋滞します。
sentence.romaji: kono kokudou ha yoku juutai shimasu
sentence.english: This national highway is often congested.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keishiki

sentence.kanji: 書類は形式を守って作ってください。
sentence.romaji: shorui ha keishiki wo mamote tsukute kudasai
sentence.english: Please maintain the format of the documents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuusei

sentence.kanji: 検討の結果、案を修正したよ。
sentence.romaji: kentou no keka an wo shuusei shita yo
sentence.english: We adjusted the plan as a result of our deliberations.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taidan

sentence.kanji: 雑誌にその女優の対談が載っていたよ。
sentence.romaji: zashi ni sono joyuu no taidan ga note ita yo
sentence.english: There was an interview with that actress in a magazine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は恋をしてきれいになったね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha koi wo shite kirei ni nata ne
sentence.english: She fell in love and became beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitsuren

sentence.kanji: 彼は最近、失恋したらしいの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha saikin shitsuren shita rashii no
sentence.english: I hear he had a broken heart recently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koisuru

sentence.kanji: 恋する気持ちを歌にしました。
sentence.romaji: koisuru kimochi wo uta ni shimashita
sentence.english: I expressed my feelings of love in my song.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's renai

sentence.kanji: 彼女は恋愛にあこがれる年ごろです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha renai ni akogareru toshi goro desu
sentence.english: She's at that age when girls yearn for romance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsukoi

sentence.kanji: 私の初恋は小学生の時です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no hatsukoi ha shougakusei no toki desu
sentence.english: My first love was when I was at elementary school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakigao

sentence.kanji: 彼女は泣き顔になったの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha nakigao ni nata no
sentence.english: She looked like she was about to cry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's egao

sentence.kanji: 赤ちゃんの笑顔が可愛いい。
sentence.romaji: akachan no egao ga kawaii
sentence.english: The baby's smile is cute.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's raku

sentence.kanji: 彼には楽な仕事が与えられたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ni ha raku na shigoto ga ataerareta yo
sentence.english: He was given an easy job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunkazai

sentence.kanji: この建物は国の文化財です。
sentence.romaji: kono tatemono ha kuni no bunkazai desu
sentence.english: This building is a national cultural asset.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuuryou

sentence.kanji: 先月、そのコースを修了しました。
sentence.romaji: sengetsu sono ko-su wo shuuryou shimashita
sentence.english: I finished the course last month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taiou

sentence.kanji: 彼はいつも素早い対応をするね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha itsumo subayai taiou wo suru ne
sentence.english: He always responds quickly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukuramu

sentence.kanji: 桜のつぼみが膨らんだのね。
sentence.romaji: sakura no tsubomi ga fukuranda no ne
sentence.english: The cherry blossom buds swelled.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiniro

sentence.kanji: あの寺の屋根は金色ですね。
sentence.romaji: ano tera no yane ha kiniro desu ne
sentence.english: The roof of that temple is golden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keisei

sentence.kanji: 今は骨が形成される大切な時期です。
sentence.romaji: ima ha hone ga keisei sareru taisetsu na jiki desu
sentence.english: This is an important period in life when bones are being formed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinsatsu

sentence.kanji: 今日、病院で診察してもらったの。
sentence.romaji: kyou byouin de shinsatsu shite morata no
sentence.english: I had an examination at the hospital today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miru

sentence.kanji: 今日、医者に診てもらいました。
sentence.romaji: kyou 、 isha ni mitemoraimashita。
sentence.english: I had the doctor examine me today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's satsuei

sentence.kanji: 撮影は3ヶ月かけて行われました。
sentence.romaji: satsuei ha sankagetsu kakete okonawaremashita
sentence.english: Shooting took place over three months.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taihi

sentence.kanji: この絵は赤と黒の対比が美しいですね。
sentence.romaji: kono e ha aka to kuro no taihi ga utsukushii desu ne
sentence.english: The contrast of the red and black in this picture is beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shindan

sentence.kanji: 医師は異常なしと診断したんだ。
sentence.romaji: ishi ha ijou nashi to shindan shita n da
sentence.english: According to the doctor's diagnosis, there's no abnormality.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bungaku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は文学に興味を持っているのよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha bungaku ni kyoumi wo moteiru no yo 。
sentence.english: She's interested in literature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinbunkagaku

sentence.kanji: 大学で人文科学を専攻しました。
sentence.romaji: daigaku de jinbunkagaku wo senkou shimashita
sentence.english: I majored in humanities when I was in college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zetai

sentence.kanji: そんなことは絶対できないよ。
sentence.romaji: sonna koto ha zetai dekinai yo
sentence.english: I can never ever do such a thing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taezu

sentence.kanji: 今日は絶えず電話が鳴りました。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha taezu denwa ga narimashita
sentence.english: The telephone didn't stop ringing today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokogao

sentence.kanji: 彼女の横顔は素敵だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no yokogao ha suteki da
sentence.english: Her profile is lovely.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utsusu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は自分の姿を鏡に映したの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha jibun no sugata wo kagami ni utsushita no
sentence.english: She looked at herself in the mirror.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaotsuki

sentence.kanji: 彼は恐い顔付きで話したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kowai kaotsuki de hanashita no
sentence.english: He spoke with a scary look on his face.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunkei

sentence.kanji: 彼女は文系です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha bunkei desu
sentence.english: She's in a humanities program.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sekidou

sentence.kanji: 赤道に沿って旅をしました。
sentence.romaji: sekidou ni sote tabi wo shimashita
sentence.english: I traveled around, following the equator.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wan

sentence.kanji: 東京湾は重要な役割を果たしている。
sentence.romaji: toukyouwan ha juuyou na yakuwari wo hatashite iru
sentence.english: Tokyo Bay plays an important role.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakuhin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は薬品を戸棚から出したんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yakuhin wo todana kara dashita n da
sentence.english: She took the medicine out of the cupboard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hadairo

sentence.kanji: 彼女は肌色のシャツを着ています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hadairo no shatsu wo kite imasu
sentence.english: She's wearing a skin-colored shirt.
